import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import ItemElements from './ItemElements'; const BasicElements = () => { const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date()) const [showAddItem, setShowAddItem] = useState(false); const LINE_ITEM = { item: "", quantity: "", price: "", total: "", }; const tableHeaders = ["Item", "Quantity", "Price", "Total"]; const [data, setData] = useState([() => LINE_ITEM]); const handleAdd = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('handleAdd') setShowAddItem(true) let temp = [...data] temp.push(LINE_ITEM) setData(LINE_ITEM) }; const handleData = (event, listItemIndex, keyIndex ) => { let temp = {...data} temp[listItemIndex][keyIndex] = event.target.value // update the state setData(() => temp) }; const handleChange = date => { setStartDate(date); }; return (
